ygData.subject: Re: A rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I know, Matt.  I had to throw it in though, because as of recently a lot of high level players are giving the majority of good players in that level range
ygData.messageBody:
>
> In my intial post (maybe the second one, it was this AM) I spent a whole
> paragraph saying how this wasn't a bash on lvl 50 players, and how I'd
> be one if I hadn't stopped playing for like 5 months... Thats not where
> I'm getting at all. My annoyance comes from every time Verant feels
> compelled to keep the dragons challenging for the current crop of lvl
> 50's. They are not considering the people who aren't there yet...

I know, Matt. I had to throw it in though, because as of recently
a lot of high level players are giving the majority of good players
in that level range a bad rap. That wasn't geared to you, just as
a general comment to the L1-L40 populace. I'm one of the friendliest
L50s on our server when it comes to helping people out. And people
are surprised, which concerns me. I would like to dispel this elite
visage that people give L50 players. It simply does not hold true
for me. And it applies to our conversation in that when you make
L50 the dragons (all 10 of them, doh /tease, sorry) will still be an
option to you, I guarentee it. I'm me first, badass L50 second ;)

Ryan/Harmonic.
